name: MAHENDRA PITAMBER
experience: Centelon, has its product stack in Banking and Finance domain.

Handling and maintaining product deployment in QA/UAT/SIT environments,
This is a Multi-Tenant micro-services based Java application to monitor the  Real Estate ,Private
Equity  asset type investments. Application has modules as Investment,Project Financial ,Sales
Monitor has been integrated with several other micro-services  such as Document,Notiﬁcation
WorkFlowEngine which are useful for document handling,Managing notiﬁcations , Task ,scheduling
meeting agenda with emails and setting up custom workﬂow to calculate ﬁnancial ratios for
ﬁnancial Statements. Monitor Application has used amCharts and  d3 graphs to project data on UI .
